statements: DELETE FROM EmployeeFeedback WHERE suggestion LIKE '%improvement%'
DELETE FROM feedback WHERE employee_id = 123 AND feedback_date <= '2022-01-31';
DELETE FROM suggestions WHERE employee_id = 456 AND suggestion_date > '2022-02-15';
DELETE FROM EmployeeRecognition WHERE employee_id = 100 AND recognition_type = 'Appreciation';

DELETE FROM feedback_ratings WHERE feedback_id = 1 AND rating < 3;
DELETE FROM employee_suggestions WHERE submitted_by = 1001 AND suggestion_id = 5;
